name: Sekai no Omoshiro Party Game
overview: "World's Fun Party Game" is a game with a distinctive occupation as a motif in the countries of the world. You can enjoy 5 games of snake wrestling, obsession extermination, cowboy, Japanese samurai, and seabed exploration. Even one person can play with 2 to 4 large numbers of people. Depending on the game, it corresponds to Wii Motion Plus and Balanced Wii Boat.
